ER_DUP_ENTRY.message: It looks like you have already added this [error_context] to your MyYoast account.

rest_user_invalid_email.message: The email you provided could not be used. It is likely already in use by another account.

rest_invalid_param.message: The information you provided in the [invalid_param] field appears to be invalid. Please check whether everything is in order.

learndash_course_not_enrolled.message: The user is not enrolled in this course.

learndash_course_already_started.message: The currently enrolled student has already started this course. You cannot enroll a new student to a course that has been started.

learndash_course_already_enrolled.message: That student is already enrolled in this course.

GENERAL_SUPPORT_ERROR.message: Oops, something went wrong on our end, please try again. If this keeps happening, [customer_support_link]
